short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform tab chaos into magic with Tabracadabra - the ultimate tab manager.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform tab chaos into organized bliss with Tabracadabra! 

Say goodbye to endless scrolling and hello to effortless tab management. With a flick of a wand, Tabracadabra closes tabs after a duration that you have decided, freeing up your browser and giving you more time for what matters most. 

Experience the magic of an efficient and clutter-free browsing experience with Tabracadabra.

Install now and poof! Tab chaos is under control.
